org.epochx.core
Class ReproductionManager

java.lang.Object
  org.epochx.core.ReproductionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigListener, Listener
public class ReproductionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigListener

This component manages the reproduction operation of selecting a program to survive into the next generation.

Use of the reproduction operation will generate the following events:

Event Revert Modify Raised when?
onReproductionStart no no Before the reproduction operation is carried out.
onReproduction yes yes Immediately after a program is selected for reproduction, giving the listener the opportunity to request a revert which will cause a re-selection of a program and this event to be raised again.
onReproductionEnd no no After the reproduction operation has been completed.

Constructor Summary
ReproductionManager(Model model)
          Constructs an instance of ReproductionManager which will setup the reproduction operation.
 
Method Summary
 void onConfigure()
          This event is automatically fired at the recommended times for loading model parameters - that is at the start of model execution and at the start of each successive run.
 CandidateProgram reproduce()
          Selects a CandidateProgram from the population using the ProgramSelector returned by a call to getProgramSelector() on the model given at construction.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

ReproductionManager

public ReproductionManager(Model model)
Constructs an instance of ReproductionManager which will setup the reproduction operation. The selection of the program to be reproduced is performed by the parent selector obtained from a call to the model's getParentSelector() method.

Parameters:
model - the model which defines the ProgramSelector to use to select the program to be reproduced.
Method Detail

onConfigure

public void onConfigure()
Description copied from interface: ConfigListener
This event is automatically fired at the recommended times for loading model parameters - that is at the start of model execution and at the start of each successive run. It may also be triggered manually, potentially by the model if it updates its parameters at an unorthadox time in the life cycle.

Specified by:
onConfigure in interface ConfigListener

reproduce

public CandidateProgram reproduce()
Selects a CandidateProgram from the population using the ProgramSelector returned by a call to getProgramSelector() on the model given at construction.

Returns:
a CandidateProgram selected for reproduction.
